sentences.sentence: Every tournament can be transformed into a diconnected tournament by the reorientation of just one arc.
sentences.translation: 每个竞赛图只通过一条弧的改向而转变为双向连通竞赛图。

sentences.sentence: It is simply a reorientation and formalization of many of the things good software architects have been doing all along.
sentences.translation: 它不过是重定位和规范化大多数优秀软件架构师已经一直在做的事情。

sentences.sentence: The reorientation of NASA’s planetary exploration programs is in response to a recent National Research Council report card.
sentences.translation: NASA对行星探索的再定位是为了回应最近的国际研究会议的报告。
